### A certified Digital Public Good (DPG)

#### The [Digital Public Goods Alliance](https://www.digitalpublicgoods.net/) certified magasin as a [DPG](https://github.com/unicef/magasin/discussions/103) in 2024. 

<small>What does that mean? 
Being recognized as a digital public good (DPG) means that magasin adheres to [open source principles](./architecture.qmd), [data privacy](implement/data-privacy.qmd), and software best practices. It ensures that our platform does no harm and helps attain the [Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)](./sdgs.qmd).</small>
:::
